text: The Bowls England National Championships (Amy Rose Bowl) is one of the events at the annual Bowls England National Championships. ==Past Winners== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- !width="50"|Year !width="250"|Champion !width="250"|Runner-up |- | align=center|2008||Yorkshire ||Somerset |- | align=center|2009||Devon ||Surrey |- | align=center|2010||Essex ||Yorkshire |- | align=center|2011||Devon ||Kent |- | align=center|2012||Devon ||Somerset |- | align=center|2013||Devon ||Surrey |- | align=center|2014||Sussex ||Surrey |- | align=center|2015||Surrey ||Somerset |- | align=center|2016||Somerset||Kent |- | align=center|2017|| Devon || Somerset |- | align=center|2018|| Wiltshire ||Cornwall |- | align=center|2019|| Northamptonshire ||Somerset |- |align=center|2020|| cancelled || due to the COVID-19 pandemic. |} ==References== Category:Bowls in England
